u.normal_commission, u.create_agent_flg, u.split_min_rate, u.split_max_rate, u.single_buy_max_amount, u.status, u.del_flag, u.login_ip, u.login_date, u.create_by, u.create_time, u.remark, d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.status as dept_status, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.status as role_status ,case when IFNULL(alipay.approveCnt,0) > 0 then '1' when IFNULL(wechatpayNoApprove.approveCnt,0) > 0 then '0' else '2' end as alipay_approve_flg ,case when IFNULL(wechatpay.approveCnt,0) > 0 then '1' when IFNULL(wechatpayNoApprove.approveCnt,0) > 0 then '0' else '2' end as wechat_pay_approve_flg from sys_user u left join sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='0' and a.status='0' group by a.user_id) alipayNoApprove on alipayNoApprove.user_id=u.user_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='0' and a.status='1' group by a.user_id) alipay on alipay.user_id=u.user_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='1' and a.status='0' group by a.user_id) wechatpayNoApprove on wechatpayNoApprove.user_id=u.user_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='1' and a.status='1' group by a.user_id) wechatpay on wechatpay.user_id=u.user_id

sys_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id left join sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='0' and a.status='1' group by a.user_id) alipay on alipay.user_id=u.user_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='1' and a.status='0' group by a.user_id) wechatpayNoApprove on wechatpayNoApprove.user_id=u.user_id left join (select count(*) as approveCnt,a.user_id from sys_user_pay_type_approve a where a.pay_type='1' and a.status='1' group by a.user_id) wechatpay on wechatpay.user_id=u.user_id where u.del_flag = '0' and (r.role_id != #{roleId} or r.role_id IS NULL) AND u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into sys_user( user_id, dept_id, user_name, nick_name, email, avatar, phonenumber, sex, password, pay_password, real_name, idcard_no, idcard_front_img, idcard_back_img, face_img, wallet_address, amount, invite_code, wechat_pay_remark, wechat_pay_img, alipay_remark, alipay_img, unionpay_remark, unionpay_account, unionpay_card, user_type, parent_user_id, ungent_commission, normal_commission, create_agent_flg, split_min_rate, split_max_rate, single_buy_max_amount, status, create_by, remark, create_time )values( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{phonenumber}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{payPassword}, #{realName}, #{idcardNo}, #{idcardFrontImg}, #{idcardBackImg}, #{faceImg}, #{walletAddress}, #{amount}, #{inviteCode}, #{wechatPayRemark}, #{wechatPayImg}, #{alipayRemark}, #{alipayImg}, #{unionpayAccount}, #{unionpayRemark}, #{unionpayCard}, #{userType}, #{parentUserId}, #{ungentCommission}, #{normalCommission}, #{createAgentFlg}, #{splitMinRate}, #{splitMaxRate}, #{singleBuyMaxAmount}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate() )

mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id ,u.amount ,IFNULL(st.saleed_amount,0) as saleed_amount ,IFNULL(st.transaction_amount,0) as transaction_amount ,u.amount - IFNULL(st.transaction_amount,0) as sellable_amount FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.sale_user_id AS sale_user_id ,SUM(CASE WHEN s.status = '2' THEN s.sale_amount ELSE 0 END) AS saleed_amount ,SUM(CASE WHEN s.status = '1' THEN s.sale_amount ELSE 0 END) AS transaction_amount FROM sys_sale_coin s WHERE s.sale_user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY s.sale_user_id )st ON st.sale_user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
